data.name: BuyBankTransferText1
data.value: European Account holders in the Single Euro Payments Area (SEPA) without access to an instant payment method can buy {0} by bank transfer. The {0} price is equal to the actual market price at the time your transaction is processed after receiving confirmation from our bank of your transfer.

data.name: BuyBankTransferText2
data.value: Make sure to initiate your bank transfer from the same bank account as is connected to your Account and to put your Account code in the comment field of the bank transaction! The bank account details for initiating a bank transfer are displayed when reviewing your order.

data.name: BuyFormAmountHelp
data.value: Available maximum amount depends on your Account status.

data.name: BuyInstantPaymentText1
data.value: Account holders can almost instantly buy {0} using the applicable online instant payment method (iDeal, Bancontact Mister Cash, GiroPay, MyBank, Sofort and Interac). Within a few minutes you will automatically receive the {0} you ordered in your private {0} wallet. Note: some transactions may have a send delay.

data.name: BuyInstantPaymentText2
data.value: The exact amount of {0} you can puchase for the selected amount of money is dynamically updated above (refreshes every minute) according to the real-time buy price. When you click the Review Order button, the {0} buy price will be locked and the lock in period is displayed. This way you know exactly how many {0} you will receive in your wallet. After clicking the Review Order button we advise you to continue your checkout without delay. If your payment takes more than the lock in period to finalise, your {0} price will be updated with the actual buy price at the time of receiving your payment signal. In that case the final amount of {0} sent to your wallet may differ slightly.

data.name: BuyInstantPaymentTitle
data.value: Buy {0} with online instant payment method

data.name: BuyTransactionCostText1
data.value: The transaction costs consist of a service fee, a miners (network) fee and a bank fee. You will receive a confirmation email with the transaction details after the {0} have been sent to your wallet.

data.name: InitiateSEPACondition1
data.value: Initiate your bank transfer from the bank account connected to your Account.

data.name: InitiateSEPACondition10
data.value: Bank transfers not in line with these terms will be returned (after deduction of bank costs).

data.name: InitiateSEPACondition2
data.value: Put your Account code in the 'comment' (sometimes called 'label' or 'reference') field of the bank transaction.

data.name: InitiateSEPACondition3
data.value: Only transfer Euro amounts within the limits of your Account trust level.

data.name: InitiateSEPACondition4
data.value: Transactions using New Account are limited to {0} Euro equivalent per day.

data.name: InitiateSEPACondition5
data.value: After your SEPA bank transfer, it takes 1-3 working days to show on our bank account.

data.name: InitiateSEPACondition6
data.value: Once our bank confirms your transfer, we initiate a buy transaction and the {0} will be sent to your wallet.

data.name: InitiateSEPACondition7
data.value: The estimated purchase amount of {0} is based on the current buy price. The final amount of {0} you receive will differ from the estimate as the {0} price is determined when your order is actually traded.

data.name: InitiateSEPACondition9
data.value: When your {0} are sent to your wallet you will receive a confirmation email with the financial transaction details.

data.name: InitiateSEPAConditionsMessage
data.value: When buying {0} by SEPA bank transfer, you acknowledge and agree to accept:

data.name: InitiateSEPAPaymentTitle
data.value: bank details for SEPA bank transfer

data.name: InitiateTransactionTimeText1
data.value: Your {0} price for this transaction has been locked in for the next {1} minutes, so you know exactly how many {0} you will receive (purchase amount). We advise you to continue your checkout without delay. You will receive a confirmation email with the financial transaction details after your {0} are sent to your wallet.

data.name: InitiateTransactionTimeText2
data.value: If your payment takes more than {0} minutes, your {1} price will be updated with the actual buy price at the time of receiving your payment signal. In that case the final amount of {1} sent to your wallet may differ slightly.

data.name: InitiateTransactionTimeText3
data.value: The estimated purchase amount is based on the current buy price. The final amount of {0} sent to your wallet may differ slightly. You will receive a confirmation email with the financial transaction details after your {0} are sent to your wallet.

data.value: For questions or additional information you can contact:

data.value: Your payment was not completed with the following reason:

data.name: ReturnMessageSuccess

data.value: No Payment method available for this account

data.value: The exchange service is currently not active

data.value: The exchange service is currently not active

data.name: BUYERRORCODE009
data.value: Aggregated transaction buy value exceeding daily limit

data.name: BUYERRORCODE010
data.value: Transaction currently not possible, buying transactions have been disabled

data.name: BankInfoBicAttention
data.value: Attention: The BIC code of your bank should be 8 or 11 characters long and contains your bank country code!

data.name: BankInfoBicInfoLine01
data.value: The BIC code of your bank is:

data.name: BankInfoBicInfoLine02
data.value: Please update also the following bank details:

data.name: BankInfoBicMessage01
data.value: To initiate your first buy transaction we need to know the BIC/SWIFT code of your bank. This code is an unique identification code for a particular bank and are used when transferring money between banks, particularly for international wire transfers. The BIC/SWIFT codes consist of 8 or 11 characters. You can find the BIC code of your bank on the homepage of your bank or by using an online tool like IBAN Calculator.

data.name: BankInfoBicMessage02
data.value: We can only process payments where the BIC code of your bank is consistent with the IBAN code of your bank account.

data.name: InitiateTransactionBankAccountWarning
data.value: Only payments that origin from the same bank account as stated in your account details can be processed. Please create a new account if you want to use a different bank account.

data.name: BuyFormPayMethodHelp
data.value: When using instant payment methods like iDEAL, Bancontact Mister Cash, GiroPay, Sofort or Interac you will receive {0} within minutes. SEPA banktransfers take at least one working day.

data.name: BUYERRORCODE013
data.value: This payment method is limited. Please try another payment method for larger amounts.

data.name: BUYERRORCODE014
data.value: The selected payment method failed to initiate a transaction, please contact support

data.name: BuyInitiatedCheckboxText1a
data.value: I hereby expressly acknowledge that {0} is a digital non-returnable and non-refundable product for which right of withdrawal is not applicable. I have checked the details above and confirm that these are correct. Also I agree to the {1}.

data.name: BuyFormPaymentPending
data.value: At this moment you can only initiate test transactions, because we did not receive the payment of at least one earlier buy transaction. Please contact your bank; probably your payment order was not fulfilled by your bank or your bank performed a refund. For questions you can contact the support team.

data.name: BUYERRORCODE015
data.value: You can only initiate one test transaction per day

data.name: BuyFormCoolDown
data.value: You have successfully completed your first buy transaction. As soon as your payment has arrived on our bank account your limit will be increased. This will typically take one working-day. Thanks for your understanding.

data.name: BuyFormGermanyNotice
data.value: Sofort-Payment Service is currently not available for German Sparkassen accounts. GiroPay and SEPA are both available.

data.name: InitiateSendDelayInfo1
data.value: Attention: For this payment method our payment processor requires a holding period before we can send the {0} to you. The {0} will therefor be automatically sent to your wallet {1} hours after you finish the payment.

data.name: ReturnMessageSuccessWithDelay
data.value: Your payment was successfully completed. In a few minutes you will receive an email with the financial details.

data.name: InitiateSendDelayInfo2
data.value: Attention: For this payment method our payment processor requires a holding period before we can send the {0} to you. The {0} will therefor be automatically sent to your wallet after your payment is settled with our bank (typically 1 or 2 working days).

data.name: ReturnMessageSuccessWithOptionalDelay
data.value: Your payment was successfully completed. In a few minutes you will receive an email with the financial details.

data.name: BUYERRORCODE016
data.value: Aggregated transaction buy value exceeding monthy limit

data.name: BuyFormNeedFotoID
data.value: Currently you can only initiate test transactions. To increase your limits you need to upload your FotoID. After it has been checked your limit will be increased. This will typically take one working-day. Thanks for your understanding.

data.name: BUYERRORCODE017
data.value: To use GiroPay our payment processor requires us to collect an Id of the clients. To activate this payment option please send a photo of your passport, id-card or drivers license.

data.name: BuyPageTestTransactionNotice
data.value:
Welcome to Hermes!

To raise your buy and sell limits, we require a first (test) transaction.

data.name: BuyFormNetworkFeeHelp
data.value: This is the fee that’s paid to the crypto miners to confirm your transaction
data.comment: This is the fee that’s paid to the Bitcoin miners to confirm your transaction

data.name: BuyFormLimitReasonTitle
data.value: Maximum buy amount is limited due to:

data.name: FotoIdentificationRequired
data.value: To use this payment method our payment processor requires us to collect an Id of the clients. To activate this payment option please send a photo of your passport, id-card or drivers license. Please also provide your account code. Thanks for your understanding.

data.name: BuyPageAddAddressDescription
data.value: Follow steps to add a new {0} address to an existing account.

data.name: BuyPageCreateAccountDescription
data.value: In 2 minutes you can create and activate your first account.

data.name: BuyFormTestTransactionNeeded
data.value: Before you can start to buy {0}, you first need to complete the small test buy transaction below. This is to verify your banking details.
